definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1
Luo2 bo2 te4 · Fu2 luo4 si1 te4

definition: Robert Louis Stevenson (novelist), author of Treasure Island 金銀島|金银岛[Jin1 yin2 Dao3]
pinyin: Luo2 bo2 te4 · Lu4 yi4 si1 · Si1 di4 wen2 sen1
containing_words.word: 羅伯特·路易斯·斯蒂文森

sentences.english: "Electronics are a lot easier to compare online, " Robertson said.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特森認爲，“網上更容易比較電子產品的價格。

sentences.english: Robert ran out on his young wife.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特遺棄了他年輕的妻子。

sentences.english: The student was saved but Roberts leg fractured in two places.
sentences.chinese: 那名學生得救了，但因此羅伯特的腿兩處骨折。

sentences.english: My husband Robert told me not to.
sentences.chinese: 我的丈夫羅伯特告訴我不。

sentences.english: Lansdorp also mentioned that he'd visited Spartak last year to teach a clinic.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特還提到他去年參觀過斯巴達克，並在那裏講學。
“也許它不一定真在這裏，”羅伯特說。

sentences.english: Robert leaned back in his chair quiet and almost surly .
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特往椅背一靠，悶聲不響，幾近乖戾。

sentences.english: My wife is a bitch, Robert.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特，我的老婆就很不規矩。

sentences.english: Feifei, this is my brother, Robert.
sentences.chinese: 菲菲，這是我哥哥羅伯特。

sentences.english: When plotted on log-log scales, the Saint Robert's function is a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 當策劃對日誌記錄表，聖羅伯特的功能是一條直線。

sentences.english: Robert swears he will love me for ever and ever.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特發誓他將永遠愛我。

sentences.english: However, he was registered at the Indian Creek School in Tunica as Robert Spencer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他註冊丘尼卡羅伯特斯賓塞在印度河學校。

sentences.english: I can see Robert is nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我們看得出來羅伯特緊張得很。

sentences.english: Ann and Robert seem to be made for each other.
sentences.chinese: 安和羅伯特真似天生的一對。
“也許它不一定真在這裏，”羅伯特說。

sentences.english: John and Robert dressed much of a muchness.
sentences.chinese: 約翰和羅伯特穿着大同小異。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
